taskbody.prereq: The following steps assume that you have a table in the Editor area.

step.cmd: Add a placeholder column anywhere in the table.
If necessary, set the placeholder translation.
Select a checkbox from the palette and drop it in the placeholder column.
Set the checkbox properties. If the table contains groups, you can choose to apply the checkbox on the group(s) you want.
Adapt table properties to the new checkbox if necessary.
step.info: You may need to adapt the Select/de-select All and Make multiple checkboxes exclusive properties.

step.cmd: Select a button (for instance) in the palette and drop it somewhere in the module, above or under the table.
In the button properties, add a Simple Event, with no specific parameters.
